name: The Larder
description:
You can see food all over.  Among the heaps of food you notice HUGE rats
scuttling around, nibbling pieces off the heaps here and there.

exits.keywords: door wooden larder~ 1 -1 7906 S #7908 The Fridge~    This place is LOADED with drink, water and booze.

door fridge~ 1 -1 7906 S #7909 On The Stairs~    You can see up and down the stairway.  It seems to take forever, either going up OR down.  It is just a seemingly insurmountable climb, either way. Up is the bedroom of Redferne, and down leads to the southern end of the hall.
